title: Matthew Reilly E-Book Collection
description:
At 37, Matthew Reilly is the international bestselling author of ten novels: Ice Station, Temple, Contest, Area 7, Scarecrow, Hover Car Racer, Seven Ancient Wonders, The Six Sacred Stones, The Five Greatest Warriors and Scarecrow and the Army of Thieves.

In 2005, Matthew was the first author to participate in the Australian GovernmentÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Ã¢â‚¬ËœBooks AliveÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ initiative, for which he wrote the short novel Hell Island, featuring Shane Schofield. Over 200,000 copies of that work were given away for free in August of 2005.

MatthewÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s books are published in over 20 languages and he has sold over 3.5 million books worldwide: over 1 million in Australia alone; over a million in the US; and over a million in the UK.

Walt Disney Pictures have optioned the movie rights to his childrenÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s book, Hover Car Racer, while Ice Station was optioned by Paramount Pictures.
